Title: Haggar® Men's Smart Wash® Classic Fit Dress Shirt
Description:
Discover our smart wash classic fit dress shirt, the ultimate blend of contemporary ease and comfort. Engineered with stretch fabric for unmatched flexibility and an impeccable fit, this shirt is a game-changer. Featuring cutting-edge moisture control technology, this dress shirt ensures a sharp appearance and lasting freshness throughout the day. Embrace our commitment to sustainability with the use of 50% recycled polyester, 38% polyester, 12% elastane, contributing to a comfortable, classic fit and 50% recycled fibers. Enjoy 4-way performance stretch, non-iron convenience, and the practicality of being machine washable. Elevate your style further with an adjustable button cuff, removable collar stays, and the sophisticated touch of a French placket, all reinforcing our commitment to innovation and eco-conscious fashion.
